titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the tariffs of engines to be installed in work trucks.
To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the tariffs of engines to be installed in work trucks.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of engines to be installed in work trucks.
